p: For Spain, which is closely following Italy in COVID-19 cases and deaths, the Pearson correlation coefficient starts declining after March 13, 2020, which is when Spain’s death toll reached 100. In France, the curve still has an increasing trend (150 total deaths as of March 16, 2020), while Germany’s curve has started declining since March 15, which is when the country’s casualties from COVID-19 passed 10.
